definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: I wouldn't know a nasturtium if I saw one.
sentences.chinese: 即使我看到了一株旱金蓮也不認得。

sentences.english: He knocked her with his paw when she came to the nasturtiums.
sentences.chinese: 當她落在旱金蓮花上時，他用爪子把她打死了。

sentences.english: Once, I had taught her how to read, how to sew, how to plant nasturtiums.
sentences.chinese: 我曾經教她讀書，做針線，種植旱金蓮。
